title: Shaco R bugg
body: I just played a game where i cannot proc shaco R, i had to bind the keys to quick cast for R, but after using my R 1st time, the 2nd time i try to use it, it delayed 2 seconds throughout  the game, at 1st i thought i ay be lagging but then i check my ping and FPS seems normal, the problem only occur when it comes to use my R, please have a look
